text: @realDonaldTrump Hey dumbass, it is not a Country's virus  but a world Pandemic!  CUOMO IS PROACTIVE, maybe you should take a page out his playbook.  You have Zero medical knowledge so defer to those who will protect us.  Obviouslly, You don,'t know how to fight a war.
